betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oUse a snow globe from divinerpg on a frame made out of snow blocks

§fThe frozen planet of Iceika is a testament to what the powers of wizardry can achieve in their most extreme version.
It seems hard to believe, but the state of this land was caused by a single individual, having unleashed enough power to cause effects comparable to the fall of a large meteor.
A single spell was able to fully change its climate, turning it into a desolate, icy, land.
